name: stainless
content:
stainless adjective
(MATERIAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
with no marks on it, or made of a substance that is not damaged by air or water and that does not change colour: stainless work surfaces

stainless adjective
(PERSON)
morally good; having done nothing that could be considered to be wrong: He was a man of stainless character.
